short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens all forum pages in tabs.For URL http://www.someforum.com/thread=134&pg=2 Choose pg from dropdown, fill textboxes From:3,To:5.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension lets you open all the forum pages in tabs.

e.g. if you are browsing a forum with the URL like 
http://www.someforum.com/thread=1234&pg=2
Which means the pg parameter in the URL is determining which page you are on.

Then you can open the next 5 pages by entering
From: 3
To: 7
The pg parameter should be selected by default in the dropdown. 

If your parameter is not detected by the plug-in then choose Other and enter the parameter in the text box.

Clicking Open all in tabs will open 5 new tabs showing pages 3,4,5,6,7.
